newsitem.title: HONG KONG: RESEARCH ALERT - Swire Pacific rated buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Swire Pacific rated buy.

text.p: -- Salomon Brothers said it had started coverage of Hong Kong's Swire Pacific Ltd with a rating of buy.
-- "Bearish sentiment toward the group's aviation interests have led Swire to underperform the (Hang Seng Index) by 14 percent since September," analyst Anil Daswani wrote in a Nov 22 report.
-- Cathay Pacific Airways Ltd "will only contribute 17 percent of pre-tax profit in 1997; investors should focus on property and beverages."

-- He added, "Our earnings estimates are very conservative, based on existing rentals and capital values. We expect office rents will rise by 10 percent in 1997. ... Rising rentals would lead to an upward earnings revision in 1997."
-- "... Swire receives the highest score of 59.7 in our conglomerate-scoring model."
-- The company's stock closed at 74.75 on Wednesday.
